extendedInfo.description: "Available NOW on Selected Android Devices-------------------------------------------------------------â¢ A WiFi connection is highly recommended for downloading this game.â¢ Due to the size of the game, please ensure you have more than 1GB of storage space available and expect longer than usual downloading time.â¢ Be sure to check the list below to see if your device is compatible.The following devices are compatible with this game:HTC Evo 4gHTC Incredible 4gHTC One X+HTC One X (Tegra Version)LG Nitro HDMotorola Droid 3Motorola Atrix 4gMotorola Photon Q 4gSamsung Galaxy NexusSamsung Galaxy SIISamsung Galaxy SIIISamsung Galaxy NoteSamsung Galaxy Tab 7.7Asus Nexus 7Asus Transformer Tablet***For up to the minute updates, ""Like"" us on the Official Marvel XP fan page at www.facebook.com/MarvelXP.Level up, gear up, and fight as Hulk in his first adventure built exclusively for touch screen devices. Track down and defeat some of the world's most notorious villains like Wendigo, Abomination, The Kronan, and The Skrulls, and help THE AVENGERS pull the world back from the brink of catastrophe!In the wake of The Pulse, The Vault, a topâsecret S.H.I.E.L.D. facility in the Rocky Mountains, has busted open, releasing all of the superâpowered criminals and monsters imprisoned there. Aboard the S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier, Nick Fury recruits a reluctant HULK to round up all the monsters he can while S.H.I.E.L.D. can assemble the rest of THE AVENGERS to figure out who opened the doors to The Vaultâ and why.VISCERAL COMBATExperience raw, SUPERâPOWERED COMBAT with blazingly responsive swipe, attack, and combo controls in a complete gesture based action game.STUNNING HD VISUALSBattle huge BOSSâSIZED enemies amazing special effects, and incredible set pieces.UNIQUE CUSTOMIZATIONFULLY CUSTOMIZE Hulk to play the way you want to play. Acquire exclusive costumes, unlock incredible superâpowered abilities, discover explosive augmentations, and upgrade all of Hulk's combat stats.EPISODIC CONTENTMarvel's CROSSâOVER MOBILE GAMING EVENT continues with updates, scheduled events, and anticipated character reveals, setting a new standard for mobile gaming.MARVEL XPNow featured in Avengers Initiative and newly optimized for touch screen devices, Marvel XP is a FREE LIVE SERVICE that TRACKS YOUR PROGRESS, REWARDS YOUR ACHIEVEMENTS, and helps you experience Marvel on a whole new level across multiple games, including Avengers Alliance on Facebook. REGISTER NOW and unlock achievement badges, character dossiers, and other bonus content exclusive to the Marvel XP community.MORE AVENGERS Check out our latest free-to-play app AVENGERS ALLIANCE â recruit your favorite Marvel Heroes, and team up with the Avengers, Spider-Man, the X-Men, and S.H.I.E.L.D. to harness the potential of a mysterious power source before Dr. Doom, Loki, and the world's most dangerous villains beat you to it.ENHANCED FOR NVIDIA TEGRA DEVICESIf youâre the owner of an NVIDIA Tegra Super Phone or Tablet, experience added TegraZone game enhancements including: Improved character textures, realistic clothing, life-like environments, and Iso-8 effects."

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Really lags on the galaxy note, doesn\'t always load and the controls really aren\'t too responsive. I would have gotten a refund if had been able to play it within the 15 min refund period.
reviews.author: Mike Hillman

reviews.title: Marvel
reviews.comment: I love how this game is linked to Avengers Alliance on facebook and playdom so you can earn things in that game by playing this one. I like the gameplay, its pretty basic and kind of reminds me of classic games like Punch Out. See a pattern, counter it, attack.
reviews.author: Craig Martin

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: With the new system sytem update for galaxy s3 out yesterday.  The game run normal. No more need to disable hardware overlay.
reviews.author: Conrad Brookes

reviews.title: Misleading
reviews.comment: Game promotion with avengers alliance is misleading since they are only supporting apple users with free costumes for hulk...so buggy his movements. And captain america story is NOT available for android...yet? Once again only fApple. No answer from their facebook about this. A very big game for very little fun.
reviews.author: Jimmy Sarmiento

reviews.title: Buggy and disregarded
reviews.comment: The game itself is fun and it\'s nice that it links up with Avengers Alliance on facebook via MarvelXP, but Marvel Games really needs to give Andriod some priority/attention. It\'s been almost 2 months since the update with the invisible enemies for GS3 bug was released and still no patch or update. Also, the Captain America chapter has been out on iOS for almost 3 months and still no indication of coming to Android any time soon. Would be 5 stars if they just payed attention to and updated it.
reviews.author: Sam Saks-Fithian

reviews.title: Great game, but...
reviews.comment: I loveb this game it runs great on my galaxy s3 but when ever I fight an enemy theyvare invisible and see through it makes it difficult to counter or. Attack and when I fight a boss hulk is invisible plz fix
reviews.author: Chris Carter

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Love the game well at least when it loads. I have RAZR maxx and it never wants to load right. I got to abomination and then the credits and tried to play again and now it never loads   so please help
reviews.author: Brandon Ruddick

reviews.title: Ahw man. I eagerly awaited this since I first heard of it.
reviews.comment: The game is no longer compatible with my EVO 4g LTE. I hope they fix that soon, I kinda want to use what I payed for. T.T I will leave my star rating for now, they said they are working on fixing the compatibility. Now a few updates later there is no change, gets past marvel screen sits loading for @37 seconds and fc\'s to the homescreen. I kinda would pike a refund since the game.worked at first then not at all after the first update. Fix or refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun combat but poor content for android
reviews.comment: Enjoyed the game.  Link to marvel xp is great as I play other marvel .titles. But gutted that captain america chapter is iOS only. Feels like being cheated to get half the content.  Please fix.
reviews.author: Vishaan Pillay

reviews.title: Needs updating
reviews.comment: Game still appears to have a few bugs - however, there hasn\'t been an Android update since March - we are still waiting for the Captain America content! Considering this is paid for on Android this isn\'t really good enough from Marvel Games.
reviews.author: Andrew Hawkes

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Its not even long at all and they find a way to scam you out of money after you beat iron man it ether freezes or restarts you I actually want a refund but won\'t get it this game sucks they still haven\'t fixed any of the bugs
reviews.author: Steven Ginn

reviews.title: Upgraded to 5 stars
reviews.comment: Works great on my phone GS3 and now it is back on my Asus Transformer TF700!  Pretty cool game and it is great to know Marvel is listening.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glitches prevent play
reviews.comment: Good game but glitches on 1st wendigo fight and stops you being able to fight. Swipe action no longer picked up. Great potential so only 2 until bugs ironed out. GS3 jb
reviews.author: Rob Tucker

reviews.title: I like it at first but
reviews.comment: The game keeps crashing when ever I tap for the 2nd fight, I\'m using an allwinner tablet 4.0.4
reviews.author: mike douze

reviews.title: Why let us download if it doesn\'t work?
reviews.comment: I played the free version of this game for the first time on my sister\'s iPad and thought it was fun, so when I decided to upgrade my phone to the Galaxy S4 it was one of the first games I bought.  I was really disappointed when I tried it out and the game would crash after the splash screen.  I\'ll definitely rate it higher once they get it to work, but for now, it feels like a wasted $4.99.
reviews.author: Edward Martin

reviews.title: Good game BUT
reviews.comment: I bought this game because i want to unlock mockingbird on Avengers on Facebook ... And you need to have Episode II (in game unlock 10k iso easy to get) with cpt. America and its not ready for android yet :/ Is there some estimated release or some info about Ep. II for Android ?
reviews.author: Petr Pro\305\241ek

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: I love this game great graphics and all but alil upset that it says u can play as cap and there\'s YouTube video of it but why can\'t i play as him
reviews.author: Devon Minton

reviews.title: This doesn\'t work on the Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: It stops working after the Marvel logo plays and should be fixed as soon as possible.
reviews.author: Anthony Nguyen

reviews.title: Runs perfectly
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this game for a while best it already only thing is I thought I read something about it being updated for more levels but that hasn\'t happened yet, but other than that works flawlessly
reviews.author: shey lee

reviews.title: Not fully optimized..
reviews.comment: Please improve the performance of this game. And if you can, integrate Google Play Games leaderboard and achievements. Will definitely give this game 5 stars if my wish is fulfilled. For now, this game deserve 3 stars only.
reviews.author: Harris Hakim
